text: {|align="right" class="wikitable" style="text-align:right" |+Contribution limit per year !Year !Contribution limit |- |style="text- align:left"|2013-2017||€940 |- |style="text-align:left"|2012||€910 |- |style="text-align:left"|2011||€880 |- |style="text- align:left"|2008-2010||€830 |- |style="text-align:left"|2007||€810 |- |style="text-align:left"|2006||€800 |- |style="text-align:left"|2005||€780 |- |style="text-align:left"|2004||€610 |} Pensioensparen is a form of retirement savings in Belgium in which a person puts aside an amount of money each year for their retirement, in addition to the state pension. In this sense, it is a form of retirement saving akin to individual retirement accounts in the United States. == References == Category:Economy of Belgium
title: Pensioensparen
